name: Danganronpa Weeping Rebellion
storyline:
Herschel Klosmo is a young man, having just obtained his Ultimate High School title. He joins the prestigious Peak of Hope Academy as an Ultimate Police Officer. Unfortunately, everything does not go as planned. After passing through the doors of the Academy, it’s as if all his memories have vanished! Only a vague memory of a bus trip remains etched in Herschel's mind. He and his classmates all end up in a strange mansion, the Manor of Blessed Souls. A place lost in the middle of a forest from which it seems impossible to escape. A funny squirrel then tells them that they must kill each other to hope to escape.

Will they be able to rebel against the unfair rules of this game of death?
summary: A french fangame based on the Danganronpa series, playing with a new cast of characters as Herschel Klosmo, the Ultimate Police Officer, forced into a brand new killing game.
